stimulusHtml: A block accelerates from rest until it reaches a maximum speed, and then stops accelerating. Which of the following statements about the net work done on the block are correct? Assume frictional forces are negligible.
choicesHtml: The net work on the block is non-zero the entire time.
Non-zero net work is being done on the block only when it is accelerating.
Non-zero net work is being done on the block only when it is moving with constant speed.
Non-zero net work could be done on the block either when it is accelerating or when it is moving with constant speed, depending on the values of the blockâ€™s mass, acceleration, and maximum speed.
